My Hyprland setup
=================

These dotfile add stuff for Xorg and Wayland.
`tty1` start a X session and `tty2` starts Hyprland.

# Dependencies

## For both

- alacritty
- barriers
- calcurse
- dunst
- mpc
- mpd
- spotifyd
- tmux
- udiskie
- zathura
- zsh

## For Xorg

- Xserver
- dwm
- feh
- numlockx
- slock
- st
- sxhkd
- unclutter
- xcompmgr

## For Wayland

- Hypridle
- Hyprland
- Hyprlock
- wofi
- xdg-desktop-portal-hyprland-git


# Software not done yet

- Hyprland
- Hyprlock
- calcurse
- ncmpcpp
- newsboat
- tmux
- waybar
- wofi
- zathura
